_comment: Shared translations used across the application

sectionHeaders.familyGuideSubtitle: Everything your family needs in one clear, accessible place
sectionHeaders.quickTasksSubtitle: Small actions, big impact - tasks you can complete right now

personalMessages.title: Rakstiet personīgās vēstules
personalMessages.description: Atstājiet sirsnīgas vēstules un svarīgus vārdus saviem mīļajiem.

familyMeeting.title: Sarīkojiet ģimenes sanāksmi
familyMeeting.description: Pārrunājiet savas vēlmes un plānus ar ģimeni, lai visi saprastu jūsu nodomus.

messages.welcomeToHeritageVault: Welcome to Heritage Vault! Let's secure your family's future together.
messages.taskBringsClarity: Each task brings more clarity and security to your family.
messages.successfullySecured: You've successfully secured your family's future. Well done!

sheets.editAssetDescription: Update the details of this asset
sheets.addAssetDescription: Add a new asset to your portfolio
sheets.uploadDocumentDescription: Upload and organize your important documents
sheets.addBeneficiaryDescription: Add someone who will inherit from you

empty.noAssetsOrDocuments: No assets or documents added yet

birthCertificate.title: 🛡️ Add Birth Certificate
birthCertificate.description: Without this document, your family cannot prove inheritance rights or access accounts

insurancePolicy.title: 💰 Add Life Insurance Policy
insurancePolicy.description: Your family needs immediate access to claim benefits and avoid delays

will.title: ⚖️ Add Will or Testament
will.description: Prevents family disputes and ensures your wishes are followed

spouseGuardian.title: 👥 Add Spouse as Guardian
spouseGuardian.description: Without guardians, no one can legally act on your behalf or make medical decisions

backupGuardian.title: 🤝 Add Backup Guardian
backupGuardian.description: Ensures someone can step in if your primary guardian is unavailable

bankAccount.title: 🏦 Add Bank Account
bankAccount.description: Your family needs to know where your money is to access it immediately

homeProperty.title: 🏠 Add Home Property
homeProperty.description: Prevents your family from losing your most valuable asset

vehicle.title: 🚗 Add Vehicle
vehicle.description: Ensures your family can transfer ownership and avoid complications

spouseBeneficiary.title: 💝 Add Spouse as Beneficiary
spouseBeneficiary.description: Without clear instructions, family disputes can arise over inheritance

childrenBeneficiaries.title: 👶 Add Children as Beneficiaries
childrenBeneficiaries.description: Ensures your children receive what you intended for them

quickTasks.greatProgress: Lielisks progress! Jūs esat pabeidzis {count} uzdevumus.
quickTasks.title: 5 minūšu uzdevumi
quickTasks.wellOnWay: 🎉 Jūs esat uz pareizā ceļa, lai nodrošinātu savas ģimenes nākotni!

welcome.title: Welcome to Your Legacy Dashboard
welcome.description: This is your central hub for protecting your family's future. Let us show you around the key features that will help you sleep better at night.
welcome.tip1: This guide will only show once, but you can access help anytime
welcome.tip2: Each section is designed to be completed in small, manageable steps
welcome.tip3: You're in control - skip any section and come back later

progress.title: Your Progress Tracker
progress.description: This shows your overall protection level and current stage. As you complete tasks, you'll see your progress grow from Foundation through Legacy stages.
progress.tip1: Focus on critical tasks first - they have the biggest impact
progress.tip2: Each stage builds on the previous one for comprehensive protection

stages.title: Protection Journey Stages
stages.description: Your journey has five clear stages: Foundation, Buildout, Reinforcement, Advanced Planning, and Legacy. Each stage represents important milestones in securing your family's future.
stages.tip1: Foundation Stage (0-25%): Essential information and contacts
stages.tip2: Buildout Stage (25-60%): Assets, beneficiaries, and guardians
stages.tip3: Reinforcement Stage (60-75%): Will creation and access verification

recommendations.title: Personalized Recommendations
recommendations.description: Based on your progress, we'll suggest the most impactful next steps. These recommendations adapt as you complete tasks, always showing you the best path forward.
recommendations.tip1: Red badges indicate critical tasks that need immediate attention
recommendations.tip2: Each recommendation shows time estimate and impact

firstTimeGuide.importantNote: Remember: You can always access detailed help and support from the navigation menu

progressTracking.title: Your Protection Progress
progressTracking.subtitle: Track your journey to complete family protection

buildout.name: Buildout
buildout.description: Expanding your protection with assets and guardians

criticalGaps.title: Critical Gaps
criticalGaps.description: Address these items to strengthen your protection

recommendations.title: Recommended Next Steps
recommendations.subtitle: Personalized actions to strengthen your family's protection

emergencyContacts.title: Add Emergency Contacts
emergencyContacts.description: Essential people your family should contact first
emergencyContacts.impact: Your family will know exactly who to call in emergencies

keyDocuments.title: Upload Key Documents
keyDocuments.description: Insurance policies, IDs, and critical paperwork
keyDocuments.impact: Prevents days of searching for important papers

assetInventory.title: Create Asset Inventory
assetInventory.description: List your bank accounts, properties, and valuables
assetInventory.impact: Ensures nothing is lost or forgotten

beneficiaries.title: Designate Beneficiaries
beneficiaries.impact: Prevents family conflicts and ensures your wishes are followed

will.title: Create Your Will
will.impact: Provides legal clarity and peace of mind for your family

accessVerification.title: Verify Guardian Access
accessVerification.description: Test that your guardians can access information
accessVerification.impact: Ensures your system works when it's needed most

annualReview.title: Complete Annual Review
annualReview.description: Update your information to reflect life changes
annualReview.impact: Keeps your protection plan current and effective

strategicSummary.initial: Sāciet veidot savas digitālās mantojuma, pievienojot savu pirmo dokumentu.
strategicSummary.criticalDocumentsDesc: Būtiski dokumenti, kas jūsu ģimenei nepieciešami nekavējoties
strategicSummary.guardianNetworkDesc: Uzticieties cilvēkiem, kas risina jūsu jautājumus
strategicSummary.subtitle: Jums ir {count} galvenās jomas, kurām jāpievērš uzmanība. Šo darbību izpilde nodrošinās {percentage}% aizsardzību jūsu ģimenei un īpašumiem.
strategicSummary.title: Jūsu stratēģiskais pārskats

familyGuide.subtitle: Automatically generated guide for your family
familyGuide.title: Ģimenes ceļvedis ārkārtas situācijām

notificationSettings.your_browser_doesn_t_support_p_2: Your browser doesn't support push notifications. Try using a modern browser like Chrome, Firefox, or Edge.
notificationSettings.get_notified_about_important_u_4: Get notified about important updates and reminders
notificationSettings.enable_notifications_to_receiv_5: Enable notifications to receive timely alerts about document expirations, family updates, and emergency access attempts.
notificationSettings.you_ll_receive_notifications_o_7: You'll receive notifications on this device when important events occur.
notificationSettings.choose_which_types_of_notifica_9: Choose which types of notifications you want to receive
notificationSettings.get_alerts_when_important_docu_11: Get alerts when important documents are about to expire
notificationSettings.periodic_reminders_to_review_a_13: Periodic reminders to review and update your information
notificationSettings.notify_me_when_someone_accesse_15: Notify me when someone accesses my vault in an emergency
notificationSettings.new_features_and_important_sys_17: New features and important system announcements
notificationSettings.send_a_test_notification_to_ve_19: Send a test notification to verify everything is working

errors.pleaseSignIn: Please sign in to enable notifications

testNotification.title: Notifications Enabled!
testNotification.body: You will now receive important updates about your family preparedness.

notificationPreferences.title: Ārkārtas paziņojumu preferences
notificationPreferences.description: Pārvaldiet paziņojumu iestatījumus saviem ārkārtas kontaktiem
notificationPreferences.noContacts: Pievienojiet ārkārtas kontaktus, lai pārvaldītu viņu paziņojumu preferences.
notificationPreferences.info: Kad tiek piešķirta ārkārtas piekļuve, paziņojumi tiks nosūtīti tikai kontaktiem ar iespējotiem e-pasta paziņojumiem.

howItWorks.title: Kā darbojas ārkārtas paziņojumi
howItWorks.point1: Sargi var piekļūt ārkārtas kontaktiem kritiskās situācijās
howItWorks.point2: Visi piekrišanu devušie kontakti saņem tūlītējus e-pasta paziņojumus
howItWorks.point3: Jūs arī saņemsiet paziņojumu, kad notiek piekļuve
